channel.title: Ez-Scape, and RuniteScape!
channel.description:
Everyone there is two private runescape servers, 1. Ez-scape: Nice fun and fast leveling runescape server. Nice admins and players, pretty much lag free. Also needing Admins/Mods for this server. Visit there site at www.Ez-LJ.co.nr And click on EzScape button. Go there and signup at the forums. Currently UP, Go to the forums for the IP and all the info. 2. Runitescape: Also a very nice and fun server, Nice admins, nice players, fun communite. Currently down, will be up soon. The owner is Wildyowner1. The site is www.Runitescape.co.nr.
Please sign up for both of the sites, and ENJOY!
